title: Atmosphere Core unveils India foray plans
description: Hospitality firm Atmosphere Core has announced its entry into the Indian market with plans to open eight hotels and resorts. The first property will be launched in Kolkata in 2024, followed by locations in Goa, Bengaluru, Bhopal, Coorg, Kannur, Bhubaneswar, and another in Kolkata. Some properties will operate under the company's brand, while others will be under a different brand.
